question.text: Suppose the earth was covered by an ocean of uniform depth h. <math><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mo>≪</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi></math> let <math><mi mathvariant="normal">σ</mi></math> be density of ocean and <math><mi mathvariant="normal">ρ</mi></math> be mean density of earth. Let <math><mo>∆</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></math> be the approximate difference of value of net acceleration due to gravity between the bottom of the ocean and top <math> <mrow> <mi>Δ</mi><mi>g</mi><mo>=</mo><msub> <mi>g</mi> <mrow> <mi>t</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>p</mi></mrow> </msub> <mo>-</mo><msub> <mi>g</mi> <mrow> <mi>b</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>t</mi><mi>t</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>m</mi></mrow> </msub> </mrow> </math> choose the correct option.

options.text: <math><mo>∆</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">π</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">ρ</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">σ</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math><mo>∆</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">π</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">σ</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">ρ</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math><mo>∆</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">π</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">σ</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">ρ</mi><mo>]</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi></math>

<math><mo>∆</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">π</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">ρ</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">σ</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

solution.text:
gA=43GπRρ



gB= G43πρR3+43πR+h3-43πR3σR+h2

≈43GπρR1-2hR+43GπR+h-1-2hRRσ

∆g=gB-gA=43πGh3σ-2ρ
